text: Barindiriye ikindi kintu kugira ngo bashikire Abamarayika, canke bashikirwe n’ibihano bikwiye vy’umuremyi wawe, canke hashike bimwe mubimenyetso vy’Umuremyi wawe, k’umusi hazoshika bimwe mubimenyetso vy’Umuremyi wawe, rero umuntu ntakintu nakimwe kizomufasha kukwemera kwiwe, rero uwahora atemera kuva kera canke atagize ineza mubu Isilamu bwiwe wewe vuga uti:- ni murindire natwe turarindiriye
